description: Number of orbits of length n in map whose periodic points come from A059991.
references: V. Chothi, G. Everest, T. Ward. S-integer dynamical systems: periodic points. J. Reine Angew. Math., 489 (1997), 99-132.
T. Ward. Almost all S-integer dynamical systems have many periodic points. Erg. Th. Dynam. Sys. 18 (1998), 471-486.
formula: If b(n) is the n-th term of A059991, then a(n)=(1/n)* Sum_{d|n}\mu(d)a(n/d)
author: Thomas Ward (t.ward(AT)uea.ac.uk)
